genericTables.credential-query: SELECT fullobject FROM ${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_propTable} prop ON obj.id = prop.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE prop.propkey='/userName' AND prop.propvalue = ${username} AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.find-by-id: SELECT fullobject FROM ${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE obj.objectid = ${id} AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.get-by-field-value: SELECT fullobject FROM ${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_propTable} prop ON obj.id = prop.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE prop.propkey=CONCAT('/', ${field}) AND prop.propvalue = ${value} AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.get-users-of-role: SELECT 'userName' as propkey, propvalue from ${_propTable} WHERE ${_mainTable}_id IN (SELECT prop.${_mainTable}_id from ${_propTable} prop WHERE prop.propkey='/roles' AND REGEXP_LIKE(prop.propvalue, CONCAT(CONCAT('^(.*,)?',${role}),'(,.*)?$'))) AND propkey = '/userName'
genericTables.query-all-ids: SELECT obj.objectid FROM ${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN objecttypes objtype ON obj.objecttypes_id = objtype.id WHERE objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.query-all: SELECT obj.fullobject FROM ${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN objecttypes objtype ON obj.objecttypes_id = objtype.id WHERE objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.for-userName: SELECT fullobject FROM ${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_propTable} prop ON obj.id = prop.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE prop.propkey='/userName' AND prop.propvalue = ${uid} AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.credential-internaluser-query: SELECT credprop.${_mainTable}_id, credprop.propkey, credprop.propvalue FROM ${_propTable} credprop INNER JOIN ${_mainTable} obj ON obj.id = credprop.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN ${_propTable} conditionprop ON obj.id = conditionprop.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE credprop.propkey='/userPassword' AND conditionprop.propkey='/_id' AND conditionprop.propvalue = ${username} AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.scan-tasks: SELECT fullobject FROM ${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_propTable} prop ON obj.id = prop.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN ${_propTable} complete ON obj.id = complete.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE ( prop.propkey=${property} AND prop.propvalue < ${condition.before} AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource} ) AND ( complete.propkey=${taskState.completed} AND complete.propvalue is NULL )
genericTables.query-scheduler-instances: SELECT fullobject FROM ${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_propTable} prop ON obj.id = prop.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN ${_propTable} state ON obj.id = state.${_mainTable}_id WHERE (prop.propkey = '/timestamp' AND prop.propvalue <= ${timestamp}) AND (state.propkey = '/state' AND (state.propvalue = '1' OR state.propvalue = '2'))

explicitTables.get-notifications-for-user: SELECT * FROM ${_table} WHERE receiverId = ${userId} order by createDate desc
explicitTables.links-for-firstId: SELECT * FROM ${_table} WHERE linkType = ${linkType} AND firstid = ${firstId}
explicitTables.links-for-secondId: SELECT * FROM ${_table} WHERE linkType = ${linkType} AND secondid = ${secondId}
explicitTables.scan-tasks: SELECT * FROM ${_table} WHERE ${property} < ${condition.before} AND ${taskState.completed} is NULL
